ResourceHeader.ResourceName: VENUS EXPRESS: ASPERA-4 IMA Ancillary Geometry Parameters (CDF)
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains the VEX spacecraft position and attitude in both EMEJ2000 and VSO coordinates system.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator(s) as well as the ESA Planetary Science Archive and the CDPP (Centre des Donn√©es de la Physique des Plasmas) when making a publication using the data you are going to download. Principal Investigator(s): S. Barabash (IRF, Kiruna, Sweden)

AccessURL.Name: REGARDS
AccessURL.Description: Access via CNES Data Archive for CDPP

Parameter.Name: Position X EMEJ2000
Parameter.Description: x-coordinate position of the satellite defined in the centered EMEJ2000 reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Position Y EMEJ2000
Parameter.Description: y-coordinate position of the satellite defined in the centered EMEJ2000 reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Position Z EMEJ2000
Parameter.Description: z-coordinate position of the satellite defined in the centered EMEJ2000 reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 1 EMEJ2000
Parameter.Description: 1st attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the centered EMEJ2000 reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 2 EMEJ2000
Parameter.Description: 2nd attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the centered EMEJ2000 reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 3 EMEJ2000
Parameter.Description: 3rd attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the centered EMEJ2000 reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 4 EMEJ2000
Parameter.Description: 4th attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the centered EMEJ2000 reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 5 EMEJ2000
Parameter.Description: 5th attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the centered EMEJ2000 reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 6 EMEJ2000
Parameter.Description: 6th attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the centered EMEJ2000 reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 7 EMEJ2000
Parameter.Description: 7th attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the centered EMEJ2000 reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 8 EMEJ2000
Parameter.Description: 8th attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the centered EMEJ2000 reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 9 EMEJ2000
Parameter.Description: 9th attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the centered EMEJ2000 reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Position X VSO
Parameter.Description: x-coordinate position of the satellite defined in the VSO reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Position Y VSO
Parameter.Description: y-coordinate position of the satellite defined in the VSO reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Position Z VSO
Parameter.Description: z-coordinate position of the satellite defined in the VSO reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 1 VSO
Parameter.Description: 1st attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the VSO reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 2 VSO
Parameter.Description: 2nd attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the VSO reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 3 VSO
Parameter.Description: 3rd attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the VSO reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 4 VSO
Parameter.Description: 4th attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the VSO reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 5 VSO
Parameter.Description: 5th attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the VSO reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 6 VSO
Parameter.Description: 6th attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the VSO reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 7 VSO
Parameter.Description: 7th attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the VSO reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 8 VSO
Parameter.Description: 8th attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the VSO reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Attitude 9 VSO
Parameter.Description: 9th attitude parameter of the satellite defined in the VSO reference frame.

Parameter.Name: Mission phase
Parameter.Description: The CRUISE sub-phase corresponds to data collected before the VOI (VENUS Orbit Injection), including the Near Earth Verification (NEV) and Interplanetary Cruise (IC) sub-phases. After the VOI, the nominal mission is divided into different VENUS mission sub-phases defined by the VENUS EXPRESS mission planning.

Parameter.Name: Orbit number
Parameter.Description: Orbit number
